General.Name: Chengdu Huasun Group Inc Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu huasun technology group Inc. , LTD. manufactures and sells medicines, bio-pharmaceutical products, and building steel structures. The company manufactures modern Chinese medicines, Chinese patent medicines, chemical medicines, and drugs. It also engages in the research and development, production, and sale of biological products and biotechnology drugs; and medicines for the treatment of cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases. In addition, the company designs, produces, installs, and services steel structure buildings. The company was formerly known as Chengdu Taihe Health Technology Group Inc., Ltd. and changed its name to Chengdu huasun technology group Inc. , LTD. in April 2020. Chengdu huasun technology group Inc. , LTD. was founded in 1988 and is based in Chengdu, China.
